channel.title: Deeplearning on sesa blog
channel.description: Recent content in Deeplearning on sesa blog

item.title: Phoenix: A transformer model for German language
item.description:
• 1 Load packages/modules
  • 2 Import data
  • 3 Pipeline
  • 4 Reproducibility

1 Load packages/modules

library(tidyverse)  # data wrangling
from transformers import pipeline  # Hugging Face Modelle

2 Import data

3 Pipeline

pipe = pipeline("text-generation", model="DRXD1000/Phoenix")

4 Reproducibility
